title: PuppeteerCrawler Template
description: Fill in URL of you dashboards and you credentials on Tableu Public and the actor will request data refresh for you.

url.title: URL
url.description: Tableau public URL where you want to update the dashboard/ request data update automatically.

email.title: Email
email.description: Email to your account in Tableau public.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to your account in Tableau public.
